sentence.Network_en: The pantheistic symbolism of the time was urging one to mirror the Universal in the Particular.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是个泛神和崇拜各种神明象征性事物的时代,这有助于人们“大同归一”世界观的形成.

list.abs: 但是,一直到17 世纪末期,泛神论思想都没有正式的称号,它或者被称作斯多葛哲学(Stoicism),或者被称作斯宾诺莎主义(Spinozism).泛神论者(pantheist) 这个单词是在.
pantheistic 泛神论的pantheistical 泛神论的pantheon 众神庙

entry.def: Pantheistic religions involve believing that God is in everything in nature and the universe.

auth_sentence.content: This gorgeous album however replaces Kurt Wagner's pantheistic joy in small things with a more carnal slant on life's mysteries.

auth_sentence.content: Not only are animals evolving, say the new agers, but pantheistic universal consciousness is evolving as well.

auth_sentence.content: Classical yoga speaks of the Supreme Being, but it is not a pantheistic model, but a monotheistic concept.
